subject: Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: If Jimmie Johnson clinches the Sprint Cup championship on Sunday, he will rank alongside Richard Petty and Dale Earnhardt as one of the greatest drivers in Nascar history.
snippet: If Jimmie Johnson clinches the Sprint Cup championship on Sunday, he will rank alongside Richard Petty and Dale Earnhardt as one of the greatest drivers in Nascar history.
